DOC.brief_title: A Blind, Randomized and Controlled Study of Live Attenuated Varicella Vaccines
DOC.detailed_description: This study is a randomized, blind, controlled phase III clinical trial. The purpose of this study is to evaluate the protective effect, safety and immunogenicity of a live attenuated varicella vaccine manufactured by Sinovac (Dalian) Vaccine Technology Co., Ltd. The control is diluent of lyophilized vaccine manufactured by Sinovac (Dalian) Vaccine Technology Co., Ltd. All participants are healthy, and will be randomly assigned into experimental group or control group in the ratio 1:1.

Any subunit vaccine or inactivated vaccine within 7 days prior to study entry; 2. Any live attenuated vaccine within 1 month prior to study entry; 3. Any blood product, immunosuppressant, hormone, or other investigational medicine(s) within 30 days prior to study entry; Any significant abnormity of heart, lung, skin, or pharynx; Any other factor that suggesting the volunteer is unsuitable for this study based on the opinions of investigators;
